name: DRK 7.3 Starter Gear

sets.name: 2.50 Starter Gear
sets.description:
Feel free to use any tome gear you have in place of this, and use the unaugmented crafted pieces while you're in the process of upgrading them. 

You don't need to wait to get everything to start doing EXs/Savage!

sets.name: 2.46 Starter Gear
sets.description:
Feel free to use any tome gear you have in place of this, and use the unaugmented crafted pieces while you're in the process of upgrading them. 

You don't need to wait to get everything to start doing EXs/Savage!

The skill speed in this set comes from the melds on the boots, the neck, and the food, so be cognizant of your speed and melds if you change those pieces.

sets.name: Tome Buy Order
sets.description:
The exact best option will depend on what other gear you have currently, as well as your chosen GCD speed and what upgrade materials you have available. For more precise comparisons, you can compare in xivgear to see what's better. However, for a simple order that will be best or close-enough, use this: 

Chest > Ring > Feet > Wrist > Choker > anything else. 

Pieces other than those listed aren't BiS, but augmented, will be stronger than 750 augmented crafted.

If you get the EX weapon or the 760 Augmented Tome weapon, use it, and meld two Direct Hit materia.

description: A set of options for 7.3 'starter gear' for DRK using augmented crafted. Feel free to use unaugmented pieces with the same melds!
